internal.content:
---
title: Demo Environment Overview
description: IBM Cloud Pak for Applications
---

## Cloud Pak for Applications on Red Hat OpenShift Kubernetes Services (OCP) Environment

The DTE Team has launched the ability to provision Managed OpenShift clusters with the ability to manually install Cloud Paks on those managed clusters.

If you follow the documentation in the [Environment Setup](/labs/su0100-setup/) section, you can have a Cloud Pak for Applications v4.1.1 running on a OCP v4.3 environment. During the reservation process, you are able to define the expiration date of your environment, max of 14 days.

Have you tried provisioning your own Cloud Pak for Applications on OCP? If not, here you have all the steps to do it! It is a dedicated/personal environment with no extra cost for you.

In the next steps you will learn how to setup your environment, how to install Cloud Pak for Applications and how to configure the Developer Workstation VM which will be provisioned for you with your OCP cluster.

**Note:  You have to complete the Environment Setup before doing any of the hands-on labs**.

If you have any issues or feedback, please share it on the slack channel called \#pak-OCP. Enjoy it!!

[**Next** >>](/labs/su0100-setup)

title: Demo Environment Overview

## Cloud Pak for Applications on Red Hat OpenShift Kubernetes Services (OCP) Environment

The DTE Team has launched the ability to provision Managed OpenShift clusters with the ability to manually install Cloud Paks on those managed clusters.

If you follow the documentation in the [Environment Setup](/labs/su0100-setup/) section, you can have a Cloud Pak for Applications v4.1.1 running on a OCP v4.3 environment. During the reservation process, you are able to define the expiration date of your environment, max of 14 days.

Have you tried provisioning your own Cloud Pak for Applications on OCP? If not, here you have all the steps to do it! It is a dedicated/personal environment with no extra cost for you.

In the next steps you will learn how to setup your environment, how to install Cloud Pak for Applications and how to configure the Developer Workstation VM which will be provisioned for you with your OCP cluster.

**Note:  You have to complete the Environment Setup before doing any of the hands-on labs**.

If you have any issues or feedback, please share it on the slack channel called \#pak-OCP. Enjoy it!!

[**Next** >>](/labs/su0100-setup)
